verses.name: Genesis 30:23
verses.text: And she conceived, and bare a son; and said, God hath taken away my reproach:

verses.name: Genesis 30:24
verses.text: And she called his name Joseph; and said, The Lord shall add to me another son.

verses.name: Genesis 30:25
verses.text: And it came to pass, when Rachel had born Joseph, that Jacob said unto Laban, Send me away, that I may go unto mine own place, and to my country.

verses.name: Genesis 30:26
verses.text: Give me my wives and my children, for whom I have served thee, and let me go: for thou knowest my service which I have done thee.
